item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: Eh, not taking it seriously as much as being able to move your character from one location to another without explicit directions to do so. Or helping that person getting beat down next to you (since that rogue is going to come after YOU next...). The more complex things like guarding towers you tag I realize might take a few laps to figure out.
item.content:encoded: Eh, not taking it seriously as much as being able to move your character from one location to another without explicit directions to do so. Or helping that person getting beat down next to you (since that rogue is going to come after YOU next…). The more complex things like guarding towers you tag I realize might take a few laps to figure out.

item.title: By: Kaijn
item.dc:creator: Kaijn
item.content:encoded:
Being european(dk) makes this severely painstaking >.<
Easily feels like 2 days when Foton says “tomorrow”.
FEED ME!

item.title: By: Jick
item.dc:creator: Jick
item.description: Man, some people take the game way to seriously.
item.content:encoded: Man, some people take the game way to seriously.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Haha! Can't wait to see the rest of the story.
item.content:encoded: Haha! Can’t wait to see the rest of the story.

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: You can definitely tell when you're in an AV with "veterans"
item.content:encoded: You can definitely tell when you’re in an AV with “veterans”

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: Whew, wasn't one of my several blowups in AV this weekend. I realize AV weekend brings out the newbs, but OMG some of these people must have picture instructions to tie their shoes.
item.content:encoded: Whew, wasn’t one of my several blowups in AV this weekend. I realize AV weekend brings out the newbs, but OMG some of these people must have picture instructions to tie their shoes.

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description: Dammit Foton, leaving us in suspense like that. Have you no decency?
item.content:encoded: Dammit Foton, leaving us in suspense like that. Have you no decency?
